refnamediv.refpurpose: Adds javascript code to the FDF document

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
fdf_document
The FDF document handle, returned by fdf_create, fdf_open or fdf_open_string.
script_name
The script name.
script_code
The script code. It is strongly suggested to use \r for linebreaks within the script code.

&reftitle.examples;
Adding JavaScript code to a FDF
<?php $fdf = fdf_create(); fdf_add_doc_javascript($fdf, "PlusOne", "function PlusOne(x)\r{\r return x+1;\r}\r"); fdf_save($fdf); ?>
